description:
Shirahoshi summons the courage to risk everything to save her world, Luffy puts his own life in peril by venturing into the ocean, and Hordy`s devious nature fully comes to the surface.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hurry Up, Luffy! Shirahoshi`s Life in Jeopardy!
Shirahoshi en danger ! Ne traîne pas Luffy !
Торопись, Луффи! Ширахоши в отчаянном положении!
أسرع يا لوفي! حياة شيراهوشي على المحكّ!
急げルフィ! しらほし絶体絶命
